title.rendered: STEDI 60W MINING SPEC FLOOD LED LIGHT

content.rendered:
The ST12240-60W is over-engineered to withstand the 24/7 punishment that is the modus operandi when it comes to mining and heavy machine applications.

MINE SPEC ULTRA-WIDE BEAM

BUILT TOUGH!

DURABLE

Designed with the soul intent of handling the intense work environment of the heavy machinery in the mining industry. With inbuilt shock dampeners to absorb the harsh vibrations around the clock that most heavy machines will endure.

PERFORMANCE

Our 60w Mine Spec work light offers you the best performance and with its rugged design push through the long hours. Fitted with 6x10w CREE XM-L2 LEDs you won’t find yourself falling short of visibility.

BEAM CHARACTERISTICS

45° of flood beam to give you a wide-angle of light to work under and a usable 132m at 1 Lux.

DETAILS

PROTECTED AGAINST;

  • Reverse polarity
  • Shock proof,waterproof and UV shielded
  • RFI/EMC interference | Wont interfere with existing electronic systems.
  • Voltage and current surge

FEATURES 

  • Dynamic Thermal management regulator | Designed to operated 24 hours a day 7 days per week.
  • Die Cast aluminum ADC12 heat-sink
  • Silcon Power Cable
  • Anodized Powder coat | Abrasion resistant
  • Lexan Polycarbonate Front Cover | Unbreakable
  • Environmentally sealed Deutsch DT-2 connectors
  • Vibration and shock absorbing bracketing.  .

SPECIFICATIONS

POWER 60 Watts
LED 6 x 10w CREE XM-L2
CURRENT DRAW 5.3A @ 12v, 2.3A @ 24v
VOLTAGE 9 to 36v
LUMEN 5400LM
INGRESS PROTECTION IP68
COLOUR TEMP 6000K
LIFESPAN 50,000hrs
LENS LEXAN Optical PC
WEIGHT 2.070kg
BEAM 45° Flood
PEAK BEAM DISTANCE @ 1 LUX 132m
CERTIFICATES CE

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x 60W Mining Spec Flood Light
  • 1 x Nylock Nut + 1 x Standard Nut
  • 1 x Flat Washer + 1 x Lock Washer
  • Male & Female Deutsch Connectors

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
